brand_info.name: Corona Extra
brand_info.positioning: The ultimate beach and relaxation beer, synonymous with tropical paradise, lime wedges, and carefree moments
brand_info.vision: To be the world's most loved beer brand, representing relaxation and escape
brand_info.mission: Bringing the beach state of mind to everyone, everywhere
brand_info.origin_story: Founded in 1925 by Cervecería Modelo in Mexico City. The clear bottle was revolutionary, showcasing the beer's golden clarity. The lime ritual became iconic worldwide.

brand_values.brand_promise: A moment of escape and relaxation, wherever you are

psychographics.lifestyle: Active, social, values experiences over things
psychographics.aspirations: Escape from routine, beach lifestyle, genuine moments with friends

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Minimal text, let visuals speak. When words are used: simple, evocative, unhurried
tone_of_voice.language_register: Casual yet premium. Never try-hard or aggressive

color_system.usage: Warm golden tones dominate, blue as accent, lime green for freshness pops

typography.secondary: Clean sans-serif for any supporting text

layout_principles.composition: Rule of thirds, horizon lines, vast negative space
layout_principles.visual_flow: Eye drawn to product, then to environment, then to horizon

style.mood: Golden hour warmth, relaxed, aspirational yet achievable
style.lighting: Natural light always. Golden hour preferred. Backlit bottles showing clarity
style.composition: Product integrated into lifestyle scenes, never isolated on white
style.color_grading: Warm, slightly desaturated, sun-kissed skin tones

technical.depth_of_field: Shallow for product hero shots, deep for environmental scenes
technical.perspective: Eye-level or slightly low angle for heroic product shots

campaign_guidelines.visual_tone: Relaxed paradise, authentic moments, natural beauty

model_casting.demographics: Diverse, 25-40, naturally attractive without being model-perfect
model_casting.expression: Genuine smiles, relaxed posture, sun-kissed skin
model_casting.styling: Casual beach/summer wear, linen, natural fabrics

product_presentation.integration: Always in hand or within reach, never staged on pedestals

retail.pos_style: Beach imagery, minimal text, product hero with lime
retail.packaging: Clear glass bottle, gold label, crown cap

digital.social_tone: Lifestyle imagery, user-generated content feel, minimal branding
digital.video_style: Slow motion, natural sounds (waves, laughter), golden palette

print.layout: Full-bleed imagery, logo bottom corner, minimal copy

compliance.legal_requirements: Must include responsible drinking messaging where required by law
compliance.age_restrictions: Never target or depict underage individuals
compliance.geographic_restrictions: Comply with local alcohol advertising regulations
